buyer.official_name: Department of Agriculture Food and the Marine

procedure.title: Periodic Inspection Reporting and Electrical Services at Castletownbere Fishery Harbour Centre
procedure.description:
**Title: Periodic Inspection Reporting and Electrical Services at Castletownbere Fishery Harbour Centre**

**Description:**
The Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, a government agency responsible for the sustainable development of the agri-food, forestry, and marine sectors, is seeking a contractor to provide periodic electrical inspection and maintenance services at the Castletownbere Fishery Harbour Centre. The scope of work includes:

- **Periodic Electrical Inspection:** Comprehensive inspection of all electrical installations, including public lighting, high mast lighting, electrical smartcard meters, pump stations, and building electrics.
- **Electrical Maintenance Works:** Routine maintenance and repair of electrical systems to ensure safety and efficiency.
- **Documentation and Reporting:** Detailed reporting of inspection findings and maintenance activities to ensure compliance with regulatory standards and best practices.

The successful bidder will be expected to demonstrate expertise in electrical inspections and maintenance, particularly in a marine environment. The contractor must also provide evidence of their ability to work in a regulated setting, ensuring adherence to safety protocols and environmental standards. The project aims to maintain the operational integrity of the Castletownbere Fishery Harbour Centre, supporting the fishing industry and related economic activities in the region.

lots.title: Periodic Inspection Reporting and Electrical Services at Castletownbere Fishery Harbour Centre
lots.description: Periodic electrical inspection of electrical installations, including public lighting, high mast lighting, electrical smartcard meters, pump stations, building electrics and electrical maintenance works at Castletownbere Fishery Harbour Centre.
